    public abstract class Hand
extends PepperAction
    PepperAction used for controlling one of the hand of the Pepper robot.
    Author:
    Antoine Orgerit

      • open

        public void open(java.lang.String hand)
          throws PepperActionException
        Allows to open a Hand of the Pepper robot.
        Parameters:
        hand - the hand to open, as one of the String defined in LEFT_HAND and RIGHT_HAND
        Throws:
        PepperActionException - if an error occurred during the execution of the corresponding script
